page.title: 02PENZANCE - INFORMATION (2)
page.content: There is a market at the top of Causewayhead,but the pig and cattle markets have been moved to Long Rock industrial estate. The {Humphry Davy }statue,outside the original Market House,was erected in 1829.Davy invented the miners' safety lamp and lived near Penzance.Penzance has got a Promenade.In 1880 a violent storm flooded houses and demolished the original wall.{Penlee Park}has a museum and two tennis courts.{Morrab {Gardens}has a bandstand in it and a fountain which used to be in front of St. John's Hall.They were opened in 1889 and the fountain water used to come from a reservoir at the top of Causewayhead. Most of the guest houses and hotels are along the sea front so that the tourists can have a beautiful of { {Mount's Bay}and{St. Michael's Mount.}H
